title: Montair Is Pet Friendly - Don't Leave Your Furry Pals Behind
posting_body: ['Active Duty Military Specials - Call today for more information!', 'We are pet friendly', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 99', 'OR Text', '99', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Montair At Somerset Hill', '1704 Barnes Blvd SW,, Tumwater, WA, 98512', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 884 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Move Over Mountains - Montair is Calling!', 'Mount Rainier views, Puget Sound, and large apartments and townhomes offering plenty of room to breathe.', 'Montair at Somerset Hill is made for those who like city tastes blended with small-town charm, as only the Olympia area can provide.', 'Choose modern living in a quaint, sought after neighborhood, in a professionally designed, spacious, newly renovated apartment home.', 'Designer finishes place you in the lap of luxury, while large patios call you to the outside.', 'Amenity spaces are made to impress, being the perfect bridge to the great outdoors.', 'Relax at one of the two outdoor community pools, throw a small party in the courtyard with fire pit lounge, or take the kids to the playground in a beautiful park-like setting.', 'If the weather’s not cooperating, hit the full-sized indoor basketball court, fitness center or spa.', 'When you feel like showing your social side, we’ve got weekly resident events, and if restaurants and brewpubs beckon, exceptional freeway access quickly connects you to all the flavor of Olympia’s downtown lifestyle.', 'Features', '- Wood Style Vinyl*', '- Washer & Dryer', 'In Unit', '- Dishwasher', '- Modern Finishes*', '- Mount Rainier, Puget Sound, and State Capitol Views*', '- Stainless Steel Appliances*', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Additional Storage', '- Rustic Wood-Burning Fireplace', '- Faux Wood Blinds*', '- Walk-In Closets*', '- Extended Patio/Balcony', '- Accent Wall Colors Available', '*on select units.', 'Community Amenities', '- Complimentary Tanning', '- Two Community Exterior Swimming Pools', '- Mount Rainier, Puget Sound, and State Capitol Views', '- Weekly Community Events', '- Near Public Transportation', '- Pet Friendly', '- Covered Carport Parking Available', '- Clubhouse with Rent-able Space', '- Full-sized Indoor Basketball Court', '- Garages Available', '- Playground', '- Fire Pit Lounge', '- Fully-Equipped Fitness Center', '- BBQ Area', '- Year-Round Hot Tub', '*Tumwater School District*', 'Pet Policy', 'No Weight Limits, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Maximum Two Pets per Apartment.', 'Driving Directions', 'From I5, Take Exit 104 onto Highway 101.', 'Take the Cooper Point/Crosby Blvd.', 'exit and head east on Crosby Blvd.', 'Follow Crosby Blvd.', 'up the hill and turn left onto Barnes Blvd.', 'SW.', 'Our office is a little less than a mile up the hill on the left hand side!', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'B5y3uG5O']
